INSERT INTO REVIEW (ISBN, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONT, REVIEW_POINT, MEMBER_ID, REVIEW_NUM, REVIEW_DATE) VALUES (${isbn}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewCont}, #{reviewPoint}, #{memberId}, #{reviewNum}, sysdate)
